name: Arrow Demo
description:
WASD to move  
Q to use the arrow
R to reset the level

Seeking Arrow Demo

This is a demo i made over a few days that contains a 3rd person controller, shooting system and seeking arrow system. the main part of the game is the arrow, it will automatically pick a target to attack and then steer itself towards it. When not attacking it will stay by the players side and wait to be activated.
